thread.title: Manager, TV Marketing - Sports Management

title: Manager, TV Marketing - Sports Management
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. ™ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Manager, TV Marketing   Solicit feedback on television scripts from Creative teams Copywriters and Designers, Brand Marketing team, and Broadcast team.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
